1.t: In the Name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful

2.t: All praise belongs to God, Lord of the Universe,

4.t: and Master of the Day of Judgment

5.t: (Lord), You alone We do worship and from You alone we do seek assistance

6.t: (Lord), guide us to the right path,

7.t: the path of those to whom You have granted blessings, those who are neither subject to Your anger nor have gone astray.
7.tr: Siraatal lazeena an'amta 'alaihim ghayril maghdoobi 'alaihim wa-lad daaalleen
